messages.subject: Re:unschooling and religion
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/10/2003 10:45:44 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: I am new to unschooling, but now that I have
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/10/2003 10:45:44 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
I am new to unschooling, but now that I have written this I see that maybe I
am more of an unschooler than I thought a week ago. If I can allow my child
the choice about his relationship with God, then surly I can let him decide
when he wants to do Algebra. (Just a rambling thought. lol)
*************************
VERY cool thought!
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
